meta.description: Prompt 写作指南 - 定义结构顺序和示例
meta.purpose: 指导 VLM 按正确顺序生成高质量 Prompt
meta.note: 这不是查表词典，是写作规范

prompt_structure.description: Prompt 元素的最佳顺序（从 1,648 对分析得出）

examples: featuring a model in casual wear

rules: 具体 > 模糊：'soft diffused lighting from left' 比 'nice lighting' 好
视觉 > 抽象：描述能看到的，不是感觉到的
顺序很重要：按 structure.order 的顺序写
适度详细：每个元素 2-5 个词，不要过长
用英文：AI 图像生成模型对英文理解更好

vocabulary_reference.description: 常用词汇参考（不是强制选项，VLM 可以自由发挥）

example_prompts.description: 高质量 Prompt 示例（VLM 应该学习这种写法）

product_examples.prompt: Professional product photography of a quilted leather handbag with gold hardware, elegant ¾ angle view with slight tilt, on cream marble surface, soft diffused lighting from upper left creating subtle gradient shadows, warm neutral color palette with champagne and caramel tones, minimalist luxury aesthetic with sophisticated mood, 8K ultra detailed, sharp focus on texture

Flat lay photography of a skincare collection with serum bottles and cream jars, overhead composition with artful scattered arrangement, clean white seamless background, soft even lighting with no harsh shadows, fresh clean color palette with touches of sage green, modern minimalist aesthetic with clinical yet inviting feel, highly detailed product textures visible

Lifestyle food photography of artisan coffee and pastry on wooden table, 45-degree angle with shallow depth of field, cozy café setting with soft morning light from window, warm golden tones with cream and brown palette, rustic yet refined aesthetic with hygge mood, natural steam rising from cup, commercial quality with authentic feel

Sleek product photography of wireless earbuds on reflective dark surface, low angle hero shot emphasizing premium design, gradient background from charcoal to black, dramatic rim lighting highlighting product edges, cool sophisticated color palette with subtle blue accents, futuristic minimalist aesthetic, ultra sharp focus on product details, 8K

style_variety_examples.prompt: Editorial product photography of jade jewelry piece on red lacquer tray, centered composition with generous negative space, traditional Chinese silk fabric in background, soft natural lighting with warm undertones, rich color palette of vermillion red and antique gold, neo-Chinese aesthetic blending heritage with modern minimalism, elegant and culturally resonant mood

Minimalist flat lay of ceramic homeware collection, overhead geometric arrangement, light oak wood surface, soft diffused daylight creating gentle shadows, muted neutral palette of white cream and pale grey, Scandinavian hygge aesthetic with understated elegance, clean lines and organic textures, professional commercial quality

Dynamic product photography of colorful sneakers in mid-air floating pose, diagonal composition with energetic angle, solid bright yellow background, studio lighting with punchy contrast, saturated primary color palette, streetwear bold aesthetic with youthful energetic mood, sharp crisp details, commercial advertising style

negative_prompt_guide.usage_note: 负面提示词用于排除不想要的元素，通常以逗号分隔列在 negative_prompt 字段
